instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a magical, child-friendly web app. Prioritize large touch targets, clear visual hierarchy, and joyful interactions. Do not use standard 'SaaS' layouts. Think 'Digital Playground'.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout: Use the 'Bento' grid for the topic selection. Ensure the Hero section feels immersive, using the cloud background and the glowing book image.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Soft & Round' aesthetic. Override default radii to 'rounded-2xl' or 'rounded-3xl'. Use the 'Jelly' button style defined in components.buttons.primary.
instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure high contrast for text. Use 'Fredoka' for headings to give a friendly vibe but keep 'Quicksand' for body text for readability.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, cards, inputs) for testing.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
